Articles.Content:
http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/

There\'s a new wallpaper for phones on there but I\'m wondering if there\'s any chance of getting it in desktop size. (Maybe with a ship in the bg, since there\'s more room to work with)
Well, if you use your link and scroll down, there is desktop ones.
I\'m using them (and have been since they were released) I was wondering if the new ones will be scaled up or some such.
